title: Five NBA games, three NFL games, one loaded Christmas Day slate: Everything you need to know
content: Christmas Day includes three NFL matchups and five NBA games. We're previewing them all with picks, predictions, storylines and more.

title: T.J. Watt practices for 1st time since lung injury
content: The Steelers' T.J. Watt, two weeks removed from sustaining a partially punctured lung during a dry needling treatment and having subsequent reparative surgery, returned to practice for the first time Wednesday.

title: WR Rice among four Chiefs players placed on IR
content: Chiefs wide receiver Rashee Rice's 2025 season began with a suspension and now will end on injured reserve.

title: Kerr settles Draymond beef: 'Not my finest hour'
content: In a remarkable 15-minute media session Wednesday, Golden State Warriors coach Steve Kerr took responsibility for his argument with Draymond Green that caused the forward to leave the bench in the middle of a game.

title: Harbaugh denies rift, on 'A-plus' terms with Lamar
content: Responding to a column in The Baltimore Sun, Ravens coach John Harbaugh insisted on Wednesday that his relationship with quarterback Lamar Jackson is "A-plus."

title: Commanders to start QB Johnson vs. Cowboys
content: The Commanders will start 39-year-old Josh Johnson at quarterback for their Christmas Day home game against the Cowboys, coach Dan Quinn announced Wednesday.

title: Vikes' Kelly to IR after 3rd concussion of season
content: The Vikings placed center Ryan Kelly on injured reserve Wednesday, ending his season and possibly his career after he suffered his third concussion of the year.

title: Washington WR Boston says he's entering draft
content: Washington junior wide receiver Denzel Boston announced Wednesday that he's declaring for the NFL draft.

title: FSU's Castellanos drops appeal, enters NFL draft
content: Florida State quarterback Thomas Castellanos has dropped his appeal for another year of college eligibility and declared for the NFL draft.

title: ðŸ“ˆ NBA Power Rankings: Young riser on all teams
content: From ROY and MIP races, our NBA insiders break down all 30 teams' young riser in this week's Power Rankings.

title: NFL Week 17 buzz: What we're hearing on Joe Burrow, the red-hot Jaguars and Pro Bowl rosters
content: Here's the latest, including intel on Burrow's future, opening QB1 spots, the Jaguars' legitimacy and Pro Bowl roster fallout.

title: NFL execs on how Tua Tagovailoa lost his edge and Mike McDaniel's support
content: What has gone wrong for Tagovailoa, what's the Dolphins' path forward and is there any interest in him?

title: How a random NFL drug test led to a cancer diagnosis: Alex Singleton's 'horrifying' past two months
content: The Broncos linebacker discovered he had testicular cancer from a league drug test. And now he plays the game with a fresh perspective.

title: Luka Doncic, Austin Reaves and the hilarious bromance fueling the Lakers' wild start
content: The success and virality of this duo is doing more than quiet the typical noise around the Lakers. It also might transition the franchise fully into their post-LeBron era.

title: The 50 best women's soccer players in the world for 2025, ranked!
content: Here are the 50 best women's soccer players in the world for 2025, as ranked by an expert panel of coaches, GMs and journalists.

title: A miracle child, a priceless penny and a racing legend
content: Back in 1998, long before the United States stopped producing the penny, a little girl with spina bifida gave Dale Earnhardt a gift that raises the question: What if pennies are actually worth everything?

title: 'That's what we sign up for': Five tales -- and a few gripes -- from playing on Christmas
content: With NBA Christmas games on the horizon, stars and coaches share their stories and gripes about playing on the holiday.

title: The Playbook: Shadow Reports, lineup locks for Christmas Day and all of Week 17
content: An all-encompassing look at the matchups to exploit or avoid and lineup locks in fantasy, as well as projected scores for all NFL games.

title: Tracking the NFL playoff picture: Updated chances to clinch open spots, win division titles
content: We are following the 2025 NFL season's playoff picture. Here's how things look right now for wild-card spots, division races and even the draft order.

title: Bracketology: UConn supplants Duke as fourth No. 1 seed
content: The Huskies return to the top line as Duke drops to a 2-seed after suffering its first loss of the season.

title: Power Rankings: Should UConn or Texas be No. 1?
content: Texas has the best two-way point guard in the game. UConn might have the two best players in the nation.

title: Bracketology: Louisville up, Tennessee down as host battle heats up
content: A decisive win over Tennessee put Louisville solidly inside the top 16 -- and dropped the Lady Vols to a 6-seed.

title: Look out, Arsenal: Man City titles have been built on dominant midseason runs
content: Man City haven't been their typical best this season -- at least not yet, though the festive period is when their title wins have been built. Should Arsenal be worried?

title: 'Tis the season for rating Christmas sweaters from top soccer teams!
content: Oh the weather outside is frightful, but the selection of knitwear that fans can wear to support their team this Christmas is so delightful.

title: World Junior Championship guide: Top contenders, key players to watch
content: The tournament starts Thursday, with the best under-20 players in hockey. Here are gold medal favorites, players set to break out.

title: The NHL's best this week: Is Craig Berube on the hot seat in Toronto?
content: As the holiday break approaches, the Maple Leafs aren't exactly excelling. Plus, key games in the week ahead.

title: Kiyan Anthony is stepping out of his dad's shadow -- and into his own spotlight
content: His decision to play for Syracuse felt like a coronation. Now, he's out to prove he's more than Carmelo's son.

title: A 12-player blockbuster? Cy Young signings? Ranking the biggest MLB Christmas week moves
content: Who says the baseball offseason slows down for the holidays? Let's remember some free agent signings and trades.

title: Aggrieved fan index: The 10 fan bases in 2025 that have the right to be most frustrated
content: Who has reason for jeer this holiday season? We break down which teams' fans have the most reasons to be mad.

title: Best bets, DFS plays for the Christmas Day tripleheader: Edge to the road teams
content: Betting the Christmas Day games? Here are the odds, game picks, prop plays and daily fantasy tips for all three.

title: NBA betting: Two ways to get more value betting on the Thunder this season
content: Andre Snellings looks at the creative ways to bet the NBA's best team this season and still get value.

title: What's new heading into second season of TGL
content: From signature holes to a bigger and better putting green, the TGL is ready for the start of the 2026 season.

title: Why and when the WNBPA executive committee might vote to strike
content: How and when would the WNBPA executive committee vote to strike? What would that entail? What benefits would be lost?

title: Transfer rumors, news: Arsenal, Chelsea eye January move for Marseille's Bakola
content: Marseille midfielder Darryl Bakola is attracting interest from Premier League rivals Arsenal and Chelsea. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: Trump-Backed Nasry Asfura Declared Winner Of Honduras Presidency
content: Nasry Asfura, a conservative businessman backed by US President Donald Trump, was declared winner of the Honduran presidential vote Wednesday, weeks after a razor-thin election marred by delays and allegations of fraud.

title: Leo XIV Celebrates First Christmas As Pope
content: Pope Leo XIV held the first Christmas mass of his pontificate on Wednesday, greeting thousands of faithful in St Peter's Square before the service in an usually informal style.

title: 7 Killed In Blast At Mosque In Nigeria
content: An explosion ripped through a mosque in the northeastern Nigerian city of Maiduguri and killed at least seven worshippers Wednesday, witnesses and security sources told AFP.

title: US Officials Find Over A Million More Epstein-Related Documents
content: The Justice Department said Wednesday that finishing the release of all of the Jeffrey Epstein files could take a "few more weeks," further delaying compliance with a Dec. 19 deadline set by Congress.

title: CBI To Challenge Order Giving Bail To Kuldeep Sengar In Unnao Case: Sources
content: The Delhi High Court order providing relief to Kuldeep Singh Sengar - the convict in the 2017 Unnao gangrape case -- will be challenged immediately in the Supreme Court by the Central Bureau of Investigation.

title: Bethlehem Celebrates First Christmas In 2 Years As Fragile Gaza Truce Holds
content: Scouts marched under a clear blue sky in Bethlehem on Wednesday, as the Palestinian city emerged from the shadow of the war in Gaza to celebrate its first festive Christmas in more than two years.

title: No Smart Spectacles, Pen Cameras In Parliament To Protect Privacy, MPs Told
content: The Lok Sabha Secretariat on Wednesday urged MPs against using digital devices, such as smart spectacles, pens and watches, in the Parliament complex, as it could compromise their privacy and breach "parliamentary privileges".

title: 'Cried Over Gaza, Not A Word On Bangladesh': Yogi Adityanath Slams Opposition
content: Uttar Pradesh Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath on Wednesday launched a sharp attack on the Opposition in the State Assembly, accusing them of "selective outrage" and appeasement politics while referring to the killing of a youth in Bangladesh.

title: "Pathetic Trainwreck": Trump Says Stephen Colbert Should Be "Put To Sleep"
content: On the eve of Christmas, President Donald Trump has unleashed a fresh blast of vitriol at late-night comedy talk shows, saying comedian Stephen Colbert is a "pathetic trainwreck" who should be "put to sleep."

title: UP Woman Strangled, Body Doused With Kerosene By Fiance, His Lover
content: An 18-year-old woman was allegedly strangled to death here, and the body was doused with kerosene and set on fire to destroy evidence, police said on Wednesday.

title: Don't Let Bengal Turn Into Bangladesh: Mithun Chakraborty's Polarising Comment
content: Actor-turned-politician Mithun Chakraborty has landed in controversy with his polarising call to Hindu supporters of the Left, Congress and Trinamool Congress to unite against Mamata Banerjee to "stop Bengal from becoming Bangladesh".

title: Minor Raped, Murdered In Odisha, Locals Demolish Accused's House
content: A 10-year-old girl was allegedly raped and murdered in Odisha's Bhadrak district, triggering a massive outrage with locals demolishing the accused's house, police said on Wednesday.

title: 1 Killed In Explosion In Dhaka As Bangladesh Crisis Deepens
content: A man was killed on Wednesday evening after a group threw a crude explosive from a flyover in the Mogbazar area of the Bangladeshi capital, police said.

title: 3 Acquitted In 2009 Panipat Acid Attack Case, Court Cites Lack Of Evidence
content: A Delhi court on Wednesday acquitted three people 16 years after they were charged with criminal conspiracy in a 2009 acid attack.

title: Delhi Airport Sees 16 Flight Cancellations Due To Fog, Low Visibility
content: At least 16 flights were cancelled and scores of flights were delayed at the Delhi airport due to fog and low visibility conditions on Wednesday.

title: "We Will Set Office On Fire": Bangladesh Channel Threatened Over Journalist
content: Amid mounting concerns over press freedom in Bangladesh, a fresh intimidation episode has surfaced just days after violent attacks on leading newspaper offices drew international outrage.

title: Over 1,500 Drones Lit The Sky Ahead Of Navi Mumbai Airport's Operational Launch
content: On the eve of the commencement of operations at Navi Mumbai International Airport (NMIA), a spectacular drone show featuring 1,515 drones was organised to mark the airport's operational launch.

title: 7 Killed As Bus Collides With 2 Cars After Tyre Explodes In Tamil Nadu: Cops
content: At least seven persons were killed near here on Wednesday after a government bus swerved to the opposite side and collided with two vehicles, police said.

title: "Even On Friends": Israel Vows To End Dependency With $110-Billion Arms Push
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said Wednesday that the country would invest $110 billion over the next 10 years to develop an independent arms industry.

title: Political Instability In Bangladesh Should Be Addressed: Ex-Maldives Vice President
content: Former Vice President of Maldives Faisal Naseem on Tuesday underlined the need for inclusive democracy and equal opportunity to restore stability in Bangladesh, stressing that radicalisation across South Asia can be countered through dialogue, fairne

title: Aravali hills row: Centre to increase mining-free zones amid protests
content: The Union environment ministry is expanding prohibited mining areas in the Aravali hills following Supreme Court directives and public protests. The ministry has asked a central institution to identify additional zones for mining bans, aiming to further protect the mountain range's ecology and biodiversity.

title: Unnao rape case: CBI to move SC against Sengar's relief; survivor meets Gandhis
content: The CBI will challenge the Delhi High Court's decision to suspend former BJP MLA Kuldeep Singh Sengar's life sentence and grant him bail in the Unnao rape case.  Despite this, Sengar remains jailed due to a separate conviction. The survivor, calling the bail "death," plans to appeal to the Supreme Court, citing safety fears.

title: PM Modi to hold 3-day meet with chief secretaries, ease of business key agenda
content: Prime Minister Modi is convening a three-day summit with chief secretaries in Delhi to accelerate deregulation and enhance ease of business. The meeting will also focus on developing human capital to achieve India's developed nation status. Key themes include women and child welfare, education, sports, and skill development, with states presenting their initiatives.

title: India test fires 3,500-km missile from nuclear submarine
content: India successfully tested its K-4 intermediate-range ballistic missile from the nuclear-powered submarine INS Arighaat in the Bay of Bengal. This solid-fuelled missile, capable of carrying a two-tonne nuclear payload, is crucial for strengthening the sea leg of India's nuclear weapons triad. The test marks a significant step towards enhancing India's strategic deterrence capabilities.

title: 'My son survived, but he can't see or walk': Deadly cough syrup victim's dad recounts ordeal
content: A father's life is shattered after his five-year-old son survived a deadly cough syrup but lost his sight and mobility. The family incurred massive debts for his prolonged treatment, with government aid falling short. While authorities investigate, the father pleads for future medical support, hoping his child can one day see the world.

title: â€˜Plain incorrectâ€™: Why Google AI CEO 'corrected' Meta AI chief scientist; long post shared
content: A debate on artificial intelligence's future erupted as Meta AI's Yann LeCun argued general intelligence is an illusion. Google DeepMind CEO Demis Hassabis publicly disagreed, stating LeCun confused general with universal intelligence. Hassabis asserted brains and AI models are approximate Turing Machines capable of learning anything computable.

title: 75+ Merry Christmas messages, greetings, wishes and quotes
content: Christmas offers a welcome pause, emphasizing connection, kindness, and genuine joy. This season's significance stems from its roots in hope and renewal, expanding to universal themes of togetherness and generosity. Thoughtful messages, whether for family, friends, or colleagues, carry deep emotion and foster meaningful connections.

title: Navi Mumbai airport opens today with 30 domestic flights
content: Navi Mumbai International Airport (NMIA) officially commenced commercial operations today, marking a significant expansion of air travel for the Mumbai region.  The airport will initially handle around 30 domestic flights daily, with IndiGo operating the first arrival and departure.  NMIA aims to scale up to round-the-clock services by February 2026.

title: Bangladesh unrest: Acted mute to save myself - Indian Tabla player recalls trauma
content: Indian musicians Mainak Biswas and Kallab Ghosh faced intense anxiety in Dhaka after their concert was cancelled.  Trapped for 48 hours amidst rising anti-Indian sentiment, Biswas described the experience as a "worst nightmare," highlighting the fear of being targeted as a Hindu in Bangladesh. They managed to return home on December 22nd.

title: Salesforce reboots AI strategy: Model errors raise concerns
content: Salesforce is scaling back its reliance on large language models due to reliability issues, shifting focus to deterministic automation in its Agentforce product. Executives acknowledge a decline in trust in AI models, with reported instances of models omitting instructions and losing focus. This strategic pivot follows significant support staff reductions attributed to AI agent deployment.

title: India logs steep decline in TB, malaria and maternal deaths
content: India has achieved significant reductions in malaria, tuberculosis, and maternal/child deaths, marking a decisive phase in public health. These gains stem from sustained political will, scientific capacity, and public participation. While progress is evident, challenges remain in eliminating diseases and ensuring comprehensive life-course immunisation.

title: Isro delivers its heaviest punch as Bahubali puts BlueBird into orbit
content: India's LVM3 rocket, nicknamed Baahubali, successfully launched the 6,100kg US satellite BlueBird Block-2, marking the heaviest spacecraft ever lifted from Indian soil. This ninth consecutive success for the human-rated launcher boosts confidence for the Gaganyaan mission and signals India's strong entry into the global LEO communications market.

title: Nvidia may have just admitted that it cannot take Amazon, Google & Microsoft in Cloud
content: Nvidia has shelved its ambitious plan to directly challenge cloud giants like Amazon Web Services, Google Cloud, and Microsoft Azure. The chipmaker is now refocusing its DGX Cloud division inward, prioritizing its own engineers' AI model development. This strategic pivot aims to protect Nvidia's dominant AI chip market share, estimated at over 80%, rather than pursuing cloud revenue.

title: Jaxson Dart vs Travis Hunter net worth 2025: Who is richer?
content: Travis Hunter leads Jaxson Dart in wealth from college NIL deals. Hunter's dual-position play and national appeal boost his earnings. Dart, a quarterback, has a lower but stable income. Both are NFL draft prospects. Hunter's market value increased after winning the Heisman Trophy. NFL contracts could alter their financial standings in the future.

title: 'Country is safe': Modi govt brought peace to J&K, NE, Naxal-hit areas - Amit Shah
content: Home minister Amit Shah declared India has conquered long-standing security threats under the Modi government, highlighting peace in regions previously plagued by extremism and terrorism. Speaking at a police graduation ceremony, he urged new recruits to combat drugs and social evils, emphasizing the government's unwavering support for states in tackling crime. Shah also attended events honoring historical figures.

title: Punjab & Haryana HC censures Punjab police over law and order; summons DGP
content: The Punjab and Haryana High Court has summoned the DGP to explain the lack of security at a stadium where a kabaddi player was murdered. The court expressed concern over criminals operating with impunity, highlighting the need for steps to curb organized crime and prevent future incidents.

title: Paul Rudd reacts to Travis Kelceâ€™s emotional apology after Chiefs playoff loss
content: Actor Paul Rudd shared his perspective on the Kansas City Chiefs' season. He highlighted the joy and memories the team has provided his family. Rudd embraced the team's elimination from playoff contention. He wished Patrick Mahomes a speedy recovery. Rudd also humorously suggested players deserved a break after a long season. He stated he was not too upset.

title: Taylor Swift opens up about cancer scare and Travis Kelceâ€™s support
content: Taylor Swift opened up about a painful chapter during the Eras Tour, revealing how a backup singerâ€™s cancer diagnosis deeply shook her tour family. The experience marked an emotional low point, but Swift said she later found renewed joy and stability in her personal life, crediting Travis Kelce with bringing light and happiness after an incredibly difficult period.

title: Randi Mahomes hosts holiday giveaway as Patrick Mahomes battles injury
content: The Kansas City Chiefs are navigating a difficult season, and quarterback Patrick Mahomes is sidelined with a significant injury. Amid this challenging time, Patrick Mahomes' mother, Randi Mahomes, is focusing on a different mission which is to support families raising young athletes.

title: Rahul Gandhi's praise for Karnataka jobs affirms Make in India success - Vaishnaw:
content: Rahul Gandhi's praise for Karnataka's job creation, particularly Foxconn's hiring surge, has drawn a response from Union Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw. Vaishnaw credited Prime Minister Modi's 'Make in India' initiative, highlighting the nation's shift towards becoming a producer economy.

title: Foreign court divorce binding if one spouse stays abroad, says Calcutta high court
content: The Calcutta High Court ruled that foreign courts can hear divorce and maintenance cases for marriages solemnised in India if a spouse resides there. This decision overturned a lower court's injunction on a UK court order, asserting that a UK family court has jurisdiction if parties last resided together in the UK.

title: 'Bharat Taxi': Service to roll out soon? Amit Shah shares an update
content: Union Minister Amit Shah announced the upcoming launch of 'Bharat Taxi,' a new initiative by the Ministry of Cooperation. This service aims to create job opportunities for drivers and ensure they receive 100% of their earnings. 'Bharat Taxi' will also provide insurance facilities and allow advertisements on vehicles, enhancing driver welfare and customer convenience.

title: Savannah and Zhuri James enjoy quiet Christmas break away from spotlight
content: While LeBron James is busy with the Lakers' 2025-26 season, his wife Savannah and daughter Zhuri are embracing the Christmas break. The mother-daughter duo shared a glimpse of their festive fun on Instagram, engaging in a word game at home. Savannah, a successful entrepreneur, also received praise from LeBron for her achievements.

title: Pune company's Delhi-Mumbai e-way contract may be axed over delays
content: The National Highways Authority of India has issued a final notice to Roadways Solutions India Infra Ltd (RSIL) for termination over severe delays on the Delhi-Mumbai Expressway in Gujarat. With construction progress as low as 4.9% on one 35-km stretch, the project's revised deadline is now at risk.

title: The new logic of rural welfare: Why VB-G RAM G makes sense for a $4 trillion economy
content: India replaces the MGNREGA with the VB-G RAM G Act, shifting focus from guaranteed wage employment to rural asset creation and productivity. This reform acknowledges a transformed rural economy with robust safety nets and direct cash transfers, aiming to build capacity rather than just provide relief.

title: Dharma Productions denies plagiarism claims over Homebound film
content: Dharma Productions has responded to allegations of plagiarism levelled by author and journalist Puja Changoiwala over Neeraj Ghaywanâ€™s Homebound, firmly rejecting the claims and asserting that the film is based on legally acquired source material. The clarification came hours after Puja alleged that her 2021 novel Homebound had been copied for the film of the same name.

title: Trump's tariff gamble: Who blinked, who pushed back & did it 'make America great again'?
content: Donald Trump's second term has seen tariffs become America's primary foreign policy tool, reshaping global trade and alliances.  While aiming to revive domestic manufacturing, this approach has strained relations with allies and rivals alike, leading to mixed economic results and increased global volatility. The long-term impact on American primacy remains uncertain.

title: Unnao rape case: Relocate me to Congress-led state, says survivor
content: Unnao rape survivor and her mother met Rahul and Sonia Gandhi seeking help in their legal battle against convicted attacker Kuldeep Sengar, who received bail. The survivor also requested relocation to a Congress-ruled state for safety, fearing for her life. Rahul Gandhi pledged legal assistance and support for her relocation, while condemning police action against her protest.

title: 'Disrespectful act': India on demolition of Lord Vishnu statue; Cambodia blames Thailand
content: Cambodia accused Thailand of destroying a Lord Vishnu statue in a disputed border area, amid renewed clashes that have killed over 40 and displaced nearly a million. Both sides blame each other for the violence, while diplomatic talks remain stalled.

title: Davante Adams injury update: Insider shares grim news ahead of Falcons game
content: The Los Angeles Rams' star player, Davante Adams, has been away from the field as the team recently lost to the Seattle Seahawks. This has sparked panic among fans as many expected Davante Adams to return to the field. Amid the mess, ESPN's Jeremy Fowler has shared a concerning update about Davante Adams.

title: Significant stride in Indian space sector: PM Modi on heaviest sat launch by Isro
content: India's 'Bahubali' rocket, LVM3-M6, successfully launched a 6,100 kg US satellite, BlueBird Block-2, into orbit, marking a significant milestone. This heaviest payload ever launched from India highlights the nation's growing prowess in the global space sector, capable of supporting large-scale satellite constellations and generating substantial foreign exchange revenue.

title: 'Arunachal now part of China's core interest': US flags Beijing's 'rejuvenation' plan; what is it
content: A Pentagon report reveals China's inclusion of Arunachal Pradesh among its core interests, alongside Taiwan and maritime disputes, as part of its national rejuvenation goals. The report also details deepening China-Pakistan military and strategic ties, including arms co-production and potential logistics facilities, while noting China's sensitivity to perceived threats to CCP legitimacy.

title: No more lottery: How new H-1B visa selection system will work â€” key changes explained
content: After President Donald Trump proposed a $100,000 entry fee for new H-1B visa applications, the US Department of Homeland Security announced a major overhaul of the H-1B visa selection process. The department said that the long-standing random lottery system will be replaced with a wage-weighted model that prioritises higher-paid and higher-skilled applicants.

title: J&K: High court dismisses Mufti's PIL citing political motives
content: The Jammu & Kashmir High Court has dismissed a Public Interest Litigation filed by former CM Mehbooba Mufti. The court deemed the petition vague, politically motivated, and lacking substantiation, stating it failed to meet legal standards for PILs.

title: George Kittle injury update: Insider on TEâ€™s Week 17 status vs Bears
content: The San Francisco 49ers star player, George Kittle, ended up with a brutal ankle injury at the recent match against the Indianapolis Colts. This has sparked major panic as many fans stress over his return while the team gears up to face the Chicago Bears in Week 17. Amid this, NFL insider Jeremy Fowler has opened up about George Kittle's status.

title: 'Bogus attempt at damage control': Congress slams Centre's new order on Aravalli
content: Congress slammed the Centreâ€™s ban on new mining leases in the Aravallis as a â€œbogus attempt at damage control,â€ saying it fails to address concerns over the governmentâ€™s new 100-metre hill definition. Jairam Ramesh alleged the redefinition weakens environmental protection despite expert objections, a charge the Centre has denied.

title: Zendayaâ€™s family outing with Tom Holland sparks fresh pregnancy rumours online
content: Zendaya has once again found herself at the centre of pregnancy rumours after a recent photo of her with fiancÃ© Tom Holland and his parents went viral on social media. The Dune actor recently stepped out with Hollandâ€™s family for The Traitors: Live Experience in London, an outing that quickly caught the internetâ€™s attention.

title: VHT: Samal equals Samsonâ€™s record with double ton; Odisha still lose
content: Swastik Samal smashed a brilliant 212, becoming only the ninth player to score a double century in Vijay Hazare Trophy history, as Odisha posted 345/6 after recovering from 59/3 against Saurashtra. His 261-run stand with Biplab Samantray powered the total. However, centuries from Sammar Gajjar and strong knocks from Vishvaraj Jadeja and Chirag Jani helped Saurashtra chase 346 to win by five wickets.

title: Arber Xhekaj and Nikita Zadorov clash in heavyweight showdown vs Bruins
content: The Montreal Canadiens at Boston Bruins game produced a classic NHL moment. All when Arber Xhekaj and Nikita Zadorov dropped the gloves for a heavyweight showdown. The center-ice fight quickly became the nightâ€™s defining highlight. Thu shifting momentum, igniting the rivalry atmosphere, and dominating NHL updates following the game.

title: J&K: JCO on duty dies of gunshot in Samba; Army rules out terror angle
content: A Junior Commissioned Officer of the Indian Army, Subedar Surjeet Singh, tragically lost his life from a gunshot wound while on duty in Samba district, Jammu and Kashmir. The terror angle has been ruled out, and the incident is currently under investigation. The Rising Star Corps has paid tribute to the brave soldier, offering unwavering support to his grieving family.

title: Sexual act in RRTS: NCRTC suspends train operator for filming couple; FIR lodged
content: A train operator has been fired and an FIR filed against him for filming a couple's intimate act on a Namo Bharat train and sharing the video. The incident, which occurred on November 24, led to charges of obscene acts and voyeurism. Authorities are now working to trace the couple involved in the act.

title: J&K: High court seeks UT reply on PoJK Displaced Persons; next hearing on Feb 10
content: The Jammu & Kashmir High Court has issued a notice to the UT administration regarding a Public Interest Litigation concerning Displaced Persons of 1947 from Pakistan-occupied Jammu & Kashmir. Filed by the Jammu Kashmir Action Committee, the PIL seeks directions for authorities on related matters. The court has scheduled the next hearing for February 10.

title: J&K: Leopard attacks CRPF cop in Kashmir camp
content: A CRPF head constable sustained injuries when a leopard entered a paramilitary camp in Anantnag, attacking him in the mess. The animal subsequently escaped into a nearby forest. This incident follows a recent surge in wild animal sightings and attacks across Kashmir, prompting the government to develop a plan to address the issue.

title: Tamil Nadu: Govt bus collides with two cars; at least seven killed
content: The TOI News Desk comprises a dedicated and tireless team of journalists who operate around the clock to deliver the most current and comprehensive news and updates to the readers of The Times of India worldwide. With an unwavering commitment to excellence in journalism, our team is at the forefront of gathering, verifying, and presenting breaking news, in-depth analysis, and insightful reports on a wide range of topics. The TOI News Desk is your trusted source for staying informed and connected to the ever-evolving global landscape, ensuring that our readers are equipped with the latest developments that matter most." title: NFL playoff-clinching scenarios: What's at stake for nine teams in Week 17?
content: eight more teams punched their ticket into the postseason during week 16 of 2025 . 10 of 14 teams have qualified for the playoffs with two weeks to go . five AFC teams and four NFC teams have a chance to secure something this week .

title: Points league rankings: Michael Porter Jr. vaults into top 20
content: the fantasy basketball head-to-head points league player rankings are updated regularly throughout the season based on player performances, injuries, trades, signings and other trends . he has moved up into the top-20 in the points rankings . his 25.6 PPG, 7.4 RPG and 3.3 APG would mark career highs for MPJ .

title: Power Rankings: Kentucky, Seton Hall crack top 25
content: Kentucky dropped out of these Power Rankings back on Dec. 4 . the Wildcats lost by 35 points to Gonzaga in Nashville on tuesday . a complete roster looks very much like a top-25 team, if the second half is any indication .

title: The 25 most college football moments of the 21st century
content: college football slips so easily into pure chaos after all the on-field heroics . college football is a celebration not of the sublime but of the ridiculous . it has to be a little bit weird, colorless, color-coded moment .

title: Unnao rape case: Delhi HC says Sengar not 'public servant' under Pocso Act
content: File photo: Kuldeep Singh Sengar As legal editor for Delhi, Abhinav Garg handles coverage of courts and connected legal challenges shaping the capital. From breaking down complex law related jargon to simplifying how a particular verdict or development in courts may impact the readers, Abhinav brings with him over two decades of experience in the field. Read More

title: Nepal topples, B'desh boils & Pak teeters: How 2025 shook India's neighbours
content: india watched with concern as neighbourhood navigated troubled waters marked by protests, political instability and humanitarian emergencies . protests in Nepal shook the political regime, resulting in former PM KP Sharma Oliâ€™s resignation . Bangladesh, already reeling under a political crisis since sheikh Hasinaâ€™s ouster, witnessed mass anti-India protests after the assassination of youth leader Sharif Osman Hadi .

title: Which of these eight midfield targets fits best at Man United?
content: the need for a new midfield partner in the center of Ruben Amorim's midfield is more pressing than ever . the midfielder's recent comments suggest that united may even have two midfield roles to fill soon . however, sources say at least seven midfielders were under consideration .

title: We made score picks for every postseason CFB game
content: the 12-team college football playoff is no longer new . there are more justifiably aggrieved teams at being left out . the annual coaching carousel always impacts the postseason . new coach Pete Golding will make his debut in the biggest game in team history .

title: MVPs for every bowl game: Sieh Bangura carries Ohio to seventh straight bowl win
content: Ohio RB Sieh Bangura rushed 23 yards for a touchdown to widen the Bobcats' lead . the 2025 bowl season is in full swing and college football experts are here to highlight the best performances . we'll pick MVPs from each game from Dec. 13 to Jan. 2 .

title: China covets Arunachal just as it does Taiwan: US report
content: china covets Arunachal Pradesh as part of its strategy to achieve "great rejuvenation" as a nation . it continues to arm Pakistan with latest military hardware like multirole J-10C fighters . toi has repeatedly reported that China progressively upped the ante in the eastern sector (Sikkim) of the 3,488 km LAC .

title: 'If I donâ€™t get this right, my career is over': How Penn State landed on Matt Campbell as its next coach
content: Matt Campbell is new coach for the first time in 58 days as head coach . the 46-year-old had become Iowa State's all-time coaching wins leader . he had spent much of his childhood following Nittany Lions football while visiting grandparents .

title: Why believe in Tyler Shough, Malik Willis and other unlikely playoff starters?
content: a new year threatens to begin before you've processed the entirety of the one that you're still navigating . the month of December rolled out at an excruciating pace . there are a variety of pocketed countdown calendars replete with surprises like chocolates or crystals .

title: Vaishnaw credits Make-in-India push for Bengaluru plant after Rahul Gandhi touts Karnataka ecosystem
content: The Union Minister thanked  the Congress leader for â€œacknowledging the successâ€ of Prime Minister Narendra Modiâ€™s Make-in-India programme.

title: Reports show Hemant Soren showed confidence in social security and welfare schemes in 2025

title: Actor Govinda among 40-star campaigners for municipal corporation polls for Shiv Sena
content: On January 15, political parties will contest in 29 MC covering 2,869 seats, and around 3.5 crore voters will participate in the exercise to appoint the public representatives

title: Thackerays join hands for a Mumbai that has changed beyond recognition
content: The Thackeray cousins invoked their grandfather and social reformist â€˜Prabodhankarâ€™ Thackeray along with their respective fathers, to emphasise on the lineage of the family that had fought for the Marathi manoos, stressing on how this was under threat again

title: Yunus keen to improve ties with India, says adviser

title: Uproar as Hindu group allegedly recited Hanuman Chalisa outside Bareilly church before Christmas
content: The Congress alleged that the right wing groups are intentionally trying to undermine religious freedom of minority communities

title: â€˜Banâ€™ on films at International Film Festival of Kerala: An attack on progressive cinema
content: The Union Ministry of Information and Broadcasting denying censor exemption to as many as 19 of the 206 films charted for screening at the International Film Festival of Kerala is worrying

title: Light to moderate rain likely in parts of T.N. till December 28, says RMC
content: The rain spell may be concentrated in north Tamil Nadu today, while southern parts of the State are likely to experience dry weather; coastal parts of T.N., Puducherry may receive rain on Dec. 30

title: ED arrests key accused linked to illegal call-centre that targeted U.S. nationals

content: Mr. Viswanathan also paid floral tributes to the statue of former Chief Minister and AIADMK founder M.G. Ramachandran on hisÂ Memorial Day at VIT campus in Vellore on Wednesday

title: Appeal to national leaders to stop former BJP MLA Sengarâ€™s bail: Unnao rape survivor

title: BJP accuses Bengal police of using excessive force on protesters
content: BJP spokesperson Pradeep Bhandari said protests in other parts of the country were held peacefully, but in West Bengal, the police baton charged demonstrators

title: Protest continues in Bengal against lynching in Bangladesh
content: Agitators warn chief adviser Mohammad Yunus that trade will be suspended if anti-Hindu situation in Bangladesh continues

title: NCP-SP working to align with Ajitâ€™s NCP for civic polls in Maharashtra: Supriya Sule

title: Dowry a cross-cultural evil that has disguised itself as â€˜giftsâ€™ and social expectations: Supreme Court judgment
content: The court directed the States and the Union government to consider changes to educational curricula across levels, reinforcing the Constitutional position that parties to a marriage are equal to one another

title: Awami League will not be allowed to participate in Bangladesh election: interim government
content: This will be the first time since 1971 that the party has been barred from contesting an election in Bangladeshâ€™s history

title: Bangladesh unrest: Man killed as crude bomb hurled in Dhaka; deceased identified
content: At TOI World Desk, our dedicated team of seasoned journalists and passionate writers tirelessly sifts through the vast tapestry of global events to bring you the latest news and diverse perspectives round the clock. With an unwavering commitment to accuracy, depth, and timeliness, we strive to keep you informed about the ever-evolving world, delivering a nuanced understanding of international affairs to our readers. title: Nagore Hanifa played key role in taking DMK to the masses, says CM Stalin

title: Police reinforce security at tourist spots in Kashmir Valley ahead of Christmas
content: In the wake of an expected rise in tourist footfall ahead of New Year, police chief Birdi has called for multi-layered security at key tourist destinations

content: The protest also condemned the BJP government for bringing in the Bill and the AIADMK for providing a helping hand to the BJP
